trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: 이동식 스크롤 막대를 제공 하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> 위치의 값에 해당 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에는 스크롤 막대 컨트롤을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![스크롤 막대 설명](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "스크롤 막대 설명") 의 스크롤 막대 컨트롤에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>제어 이루어져는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>컨트롤과 두 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 늘리고 줄일 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>를 누르거나 스크롤 막대 컨트롤의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 이동 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 값의 기본 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>속성이 0에서 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>의 선형 거리를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>스크롤 막대의 끝점 간에.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 값의 기본 범위를 변경할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>속성 가로 또는 세로 스크롤 막대가 표시 됩니다와 표시할 스크롤 막대 컨트롤에 대 한이 속성을 정의 해야 하는지 여부를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>스크롤 막대에서 방향이 위쪽에서 아래쪽에 세로 스크롤 막대에 대 한 또는 왼쪽에서 오른쪽 가로 스크롤 막대에 대 한 값을 높일 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>다음 표에 속성은 바인딩 대상에서 해당 ScrollBar 속성에 대 한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>속성이 명시적으로 정의 되지 않았습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 명시적으로 정의 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>속성은 바인딩이 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>속성 | 스크롤 막대 속성 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>를 사용 하 여 스크롤 막대 컨트롤의 컨트롤에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 표시할 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>스크롤 막대가 포함 된 상자 안에 콘텐츠를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 개의 스크롤 막대 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 동일한 속성 설정을 적용할는 스크롤 막대 컨트롤을 사용자 지정의 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 스크롤 막대에만 적용 되는 상태를 보려면 참조 [스크롤 막대 스타일 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [기본 WPF 테마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 속성 시각적 스크롤 막대 컨트롤의 기본 서식 파일에 속성이 있으며를 사용 하 여 설정 된 경우는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: 에 게 알려 주는 명령은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> 사용자 끌고가 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> 가로의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*> 에서 제공 되는 값

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: 사용자의 엄지 단추를 끌 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>호출 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>는 DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>반환 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>가 해당 명령을 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>반환 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> 실행</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>이 명령을 사용 하 여 지연 된 스크롤할 수 있도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>은 `true` 는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 를 놓을 때까지 변경 되지 않는</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 의 콘텐츠</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 를 끌 및</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 지연을 사용 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>에는 가로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 끌면</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand 실행</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets IsEnabledCore to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 IsEnabledCore 설정 `true` 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>보다 크면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>값 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>활성화 되어.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> and the size of the content is larger than the display area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> 에서 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> 이 고 그렇지 않으면 표시 영역 보다 큰 콘텐츠 크기는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, this movement occurs when the user presses the CTRL+HOME keys.
trans-unit.target: 세로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>,이 이동 CTRL + HOME 키를 누를 때 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: When you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> executes this command.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>의 일부로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>이 명령을 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A typical style template for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control includes a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is surrounded on either side by two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 일반적인 스타일 템플릿을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>컨트롤에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>주위에 어느 쪽에 두 개의 제어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that is used with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> 함께 사용 되는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시 되는 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠의 양을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize에 사용 되는 단위는 콘텐츠의 길이 설명 하는 데 사용 되는 단위와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: 몇 가지 예는 줄의 텍스트 또는 텍스트 페이지를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 속성의 값은의 크기를 계산 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>이동 값 표시기로 표시 되는 컨트롤을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>정도 나타내는 컨트롤의 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>표시 되는 컨트롤의 내용을.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우의 25%는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>컨트롤의 콘텐츠를 표시, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 트랙의 25%를 차지</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 사용 하 여 어떤 단위를 결정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 다음 사항을 확인는 ViewportSize <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>속성 같은 단위를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>크기 표시 되는 콘텐츠 양을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>
